mapper.sql: t_house_equity_demand_supply . id , t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id AS userId, t_house_equity_demand_supply.equity_option AS equityOption, t_house_equity_demand_supply.area,t_end_user.phone AS phoneNumber
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_equity_demand_supply.*,t_end_user.phone AS phoneNumber FROM t_house_equity_demand_supply JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id WHERE t_house_equity_demand_supply.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_equity_demand_supply.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_equity_demand_supply
JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.equity_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.equityOption},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_equity_demand_supply.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
